snippet.title: Guts And Goals Gameplay (PC Game)
snippet.description:
Beat your friends at a game of soccer, literally. Guts 'N Goals mixes arcade-style soccer with beat 'em up gameplay that results in a hilarious way to play soccer. 
Support the developer by purchasing the game on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1042210/Guts_And_Goals/
